question: List all patios and verandas with 50 seats.
sql_query1:
SELECT Seating_Areas.Name 
FROM Seating_Areas
WHERE (Seating_Areas.Name = "Patio" OR Seating_Areas.Name = "Veranda") AND Seating_Areas.Number_Of_Seats = 50
sql_query2:
SELECT Seating_Areas.Name 
FROM Seating_Areas
WHERE Seating_Areas.Name = "Patio" OR Seating_Areas.Name = "Veranda" AND Seating_Areas.Number_Of_Seats = 50
interpretation1: Show both patios and verandas where either of which have 50 seats.
interpretation2: List all the patios available, also show the 50 seat capacity verandas.
